title: The Evening Times
additional-notes: This is a Nigerian publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.

The ISSN of this newspaper (0331-3859) is sometimes mistakenly associated with other newspapers titled The Evening Times published in Glasgow, Scotland or in Washington, DC. The official ISSN Portal, however, associates that ISSN with Nigeria.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Shelton Henderson for copyright research on this title.
